statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, activity_description FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = '123abc';
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT activity_description, user_id FROM user_activity_logs WHERE activity_description LIKE '%login%';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, user_id FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_activity_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_activity_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS total_users FROM user_activity_logs;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_activity FROM user_activity_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, activity_description FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, activity_description FROM user_activity_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_activity_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND activity_description LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 1000;
SELECT user_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM suspicious_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT timestamp, user_id, log_id FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM user_activity_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_details WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND registration_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_details WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM suspicious_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM suspicious_transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM user_activity_logs WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_details;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT role_name, user_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, registration_date FROM user_details WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND is_suspicious = true;
SELECT user_id, username, registration_date FROM user_details WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_details;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT reason, transaction_amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp, details FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND registration_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE reason LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC, transaction_amount DESC;
